description: Figure, female, seated with hands resting on drawn-up knees.  A necklace, with two pendants, and two twisted armlets are made of ribbons of applied clay.  The figure is flat with abnormally short legs, and the hands merge without form into the knees.  Stripes of red paint on the upper body may indicate tattooing.  The area around the hips is painted with black lines.
title: Female figure
